metaTags.content: RP Daley.com | Recipes | Egg Roll in a Bowl
RP Daley.com | Recipes | Egg Roll in a Bowl

Embark on a flavour-packed journey with this Egg Roll in a Bowl recipe – a deconstructed twist on the classic Asian favourite that brings all the savoury goodness without the fuss of rolling and frying. Packed with a colourful medley of crisp vegetables, savoury ground turkey, and a symphony of aromatic spices, this dish is a celebration of bold flavours and wholesome ingredients.
Egg, Roll, Bowl, Recipe, RP Daley

structuredData.name: One Skillet 'Egg Roll in a Bowl'

structuredData.description: Embark on a flavour-packed journey with this Egg Roll in a Bowl recipe – a deconstructed twist on the classic Asian favourite that brings all the savoury goodness without the fuss of rolling and frying. Packed with a colourful medley of crisp vegetables, savoury ground turkey, and a symphony of aromatic spices, this dish is a celebration of bold flavours and wholesome ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground meat and cook, stirring, until no longer pink. Drain; return meat to skillet.
Add diced onion, sesame oil, and rice vinegar to the skillet. Cook, stirring, for a few more minutes (until onion is tender).
Add garlic, ginger, soy sauce, coleslaw mix, and optional carrots to the skillet. Cook, stirring, for about 5-7 more minutes, or until cabbage is wilted.
Remove skillet from the heat. Stir in green onions and season with salt and pepper to taste.
